dcterms:creator: H. Dibeklioglu
A. Salah
T. Gevers
dcterms:description: This dataset is recorded in 1920×1080 pixels at a rate of 50 frames per second. It is composed of 597 spontaneous and 643 posed smile videos, with lengths ranging from 1.8 seconds to 14.2 seconds, featuring over 400 participants.
dcterms:title: UVA-NEMO Smile Database

dcterms:creator: H. Dibeklioglu
A. Salah
T. Gevers
P. Wu
H. Liu
X. Zhang
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 20 videos recorded in 314 × 286 pixels with 25 frames per second, including 10 spontaneous and 10 posed smiles.
dcterms:title: BBC database

dcterms:creator: M. Valstar
M. Pantic
dcterms:description: This database includes spontaneous and posed facial expressions, with 138 spontaneous and 49 posed smile videos identified from 9 and 25 participants, respectively.
dcterms:title: MMI Facial Expression Database

dcterms:creator: T. Pﬁster
X. Li

dcterms:description: This database provides both gray and near-infrared sequences of images in 640 × 480 resolution with 25 frames per second, including 66 spontaneous smiles and 14 posed smiles from 7 participants.
dcterms:title: SPOS database
